tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hyperparameters (
    experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50),
    epochs INT
);

CREATE TABLE hyperparameters (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    learning_rate DECIMAL,
    batch_size INTEGER,
    optimizer VARCHAR,
    loss_function VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE neural_networks (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    network_name VARCHAR,
    layers INTEGER,
    nodes_per_layer INTEGER,
    activation_function VARCHAR,
    hyperparameter_id INTEGER,
    FOREIGN KEY (hyperparameter_id) REFERENCES hyperparameters(id)
);

CREATE TABLE hyperparameters (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    hidden_layers INT,
    activation_function VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR,
    dataset_size INT,
    features JSON,
    labels JSON
);

CREATE TABLE model_history (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE hyperparameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    epochs INT,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE hyperparameter_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hyperparameter_id INT,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE neural_networks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    network_name VARCHAR(50),
    architecture TEXT,
    hyperparameter_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (hyperparameter_id) REFERENCES hyperparameters(id)
)

CREATE TABLE training_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    neural_network_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (neural_network_id) REFERENCES neural_networks(id)
)

CREATE TABLE hyperparameters (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    num_layers INT,
    dropout_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE datasets (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name VARCHAR,
    num_samples INT,
    input_shape JSON,
    target_shape JSON
)

CREATE TABLE model_architecture (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR,
    architecture JSON,
    optimizer VARCHAR,
    loss_function VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE training_history (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID,
    epochs_trained INT,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR,
    hyperparameters_id UUID,
    dataset_id UUID,
    model_id UUID,
    training_history_id UUID
)
